name: White Shirts Red Blood
description:
Luxury cars, classy restaurants, marble villas over the ocean and other examples of life's glamor – your idea of the Mafia probably draws from that pool. Here and now we invite you behind the black curtain that drapes the seedy and dangerous backstage of an underworld as dark as it is alluring.



You will step into the role of Michael del Conte, a hardened criminal addicted to a few things, including violence. Trailing cigarette smoke and stopping for good whiskey between his acts, he seems every bit the repulsive mobster headed for destruction on the wrong side of the tracks. Experience the horrors of his life and try not to end up one of the victims.


  • Chapter-based non-linear story
  • Numerous cutscenes
  • Allusions to famous moments from classic crime flicks
  • Plenty of black humor and engaging dialogues
  • Attractive, saturated pixel graphics
  • Well-written and original soundtrack in 1960s style



  • Take part in gory slugfests. Blow out brains and more on a regular basis.
  • Engage in deadly melee. Send those in your way straight down under.
  • Knock out information and confessions – with your fists or something more fun.
  • Observe, analyze and stay on your toes. What if an old friend should put a revolver to your head?
  • Remain vigilant and make decisions quickly. One second may mean the difference between life and death.
